name: Rome: The Library of Alexandria
description:
This game is set in 47BC and is the story of the Roman involvement in the Egyptian Civil war.

It is an educational 2D RPG.

You play a Roman who is allowed to enroll at the Library of Alexandria...

You have a quests to do for the Muse and you must learn about Antiquity before the finale...

Quiz and Quest your way to the end!

Enter the library and do the quiz on the board and see if you can complete it...

If you need to study read the ancient scrolls.

Do you have what it takes to battle and quiz your way to victory...
